name: Sanguine (Saltie)
description:
Tumblr | Walkthrough | Personal social media

Summary

Trying to make the most out of her current situation, Miyo does her best to maintain her school life and an upcoming job at the local cafe. Unfortunately, it not only seems like she's being stalked, but now she's also being haunted by a murder case that happened in the 60's.

Sanguine is a visual novel with horror and supernatural elements about a young college student attempting to understand a series of murders that happened in the 60's as well as narrowly avoid being a new victim added to the case. Luckily, she's met some new people who've got nothing to hide.

***

This game is a horror and will evidently feature disturbing imagery and triggering themes. Proceed with caution if that type of content makes you squeamish.

Content warnings
  • Screen flashing, shaking and blurriness
  • Audio and visual jumpscares
  • Topics related to mental health and depression
  • General yandere bs
  • Light/Mild blood and gore
  • My writing

Prioritize your mental health!

Characters *** Some rambling:
    Hello, thank you for checking out my game page! This is more of a section for anyone who's followed me for a bit and messaged me about this game.
    Also this is nothing like Looking Glass. I plan on releasing another RPG similar to it, but it's still in its draft stage.
    I had to take a sudden hiatus due to a multitude of stuff going down in my personal life. Without revealing too much, I was not in the mental or physical space to work on or finish any games I started.

    Around December I finally felt a little more secure in my living situation to fix up this game. It's been a bit of a hassle to find a balance between working on this while being a full-time student, but I'm happy to finally have this version of the prologue out.

    I'm hoping this year, life won't throw anymore curveballs at me so I can actually finish my projects.
